ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So they pursued them towards the east.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they pursued them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: At sunrise they set off in pursuit of them
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus we let the Israelites inherit them all.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So the Firaun’s people followed them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, they pursued them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then they pursued them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then they followed them at the sunrise;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they overtook them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Pharaoh and his people pursued them at sunrise,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then they pursued them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then they pursued them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So they pursued them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So they pursued them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they pursued them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So they pursued them at sunrise.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:60]   Then they pursued them, they caught them up, at sunrise.
